hero.description: I create modern, responsive and user-friendly web applications with a passion for detail and performance.

about-me.title: Creativity meets code
about-me.text1: I love bringing things to life - whether it's a small idea that makes everyday life easier or an elaborate web application that impresses with its performance, aesthetics and user-friendliness. For me, it's not just about the code, but about the people who use it.
about-me.text2: What sets me apart? I put my heart into my work. I listen, think and implement projects with a high standard of quality and an open, loving eye for detail. For me, technology is a tool to make good ideas tangible - and that's exactly what inspires me every day.

cookbook.name: Snacki (Recipe Management)
cookbook.description: My own recipe management website, inspired by Chefkoch to manage my own recipes.

loki.name: Loki
loki.description: A self-hosted media management and streaming system – built to organize and stream your personal media collection over your local network.

skyengine.name: SkyEngine (Old)
skyengine.description: This is a Game Engine for 2D/3D that is using Java and the LWJGL3 library.

skyenginex.name: SkyEngine-X
skyenginex.description: A voxel-engine based on the game minecraft but with my own ideas.

financemanager.name: Finance Manager
financemanager.description: This is a financial manager that keeps track of my bank account.

mediamanager.name: Media Manager
mediamanager.description: This small tool takes mkv/mp4/avi files and sorts audio tracks and subtitles by format in the specified order.
